sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Rating = ({value, text, color}) => { return (
=1 ? 'fas fa-start' : value>=0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =2 ? 'fas fa-start' : value>=1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =3 ? 'fas fa-start' : value>=2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =4 ? 'fas fa-start' : value >=3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> =5 ? 'fas fa-start' : value >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> {text && text}
) } Rating.defaultProps ={ color: '#3E3F39' } Rating.propTypes={ value: PropTypes.number.isRequired, text: PropTypes.string.isRequired, color: PropTypes.string.isRequired } export default Rating;
